jasima.core.random

类 RandomFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • jasima.core.random.RandomFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    RandomFactoryOld

    public class RandomFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class provides functionality to create (independent) random number streams. These streams are dependent on a base seed (setSeed(long)) and a stream name (provided as a parameter to createInstance(String) ).

    Behaviour of this class can be modified in two ways using system properties.

    1. A property RANDOM_FACTORY_PROP_KEY can be used to change the class returned by the static method newInstance().
    2. If just a different implementation of Random is desired (default is MersenneTwister), use the system property RANDOM_CLASS_PROP_KEY.
    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt
    另请参阅:

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RandomFactory

        public RandomFactory()
        This constructor is usually not used directly, use static method newInstance() instead.

    • 方法详细资料

      • newInstance

        public static RandomFactory newInstance()
        Factory method to create a new instance of RandomFactory. The default implementation is to return a new instance of RandomFactory, but the class created can be customized with the system property "jasima.core.random.RandomFactory".
        返回:
        A new RandomFactory instance.

      • createInstance

        public java.util.Random createInstance(java.lang.String name)
        Create a new random instance. The seed of this new instance (and hence the stream of pseudo-random numbers) is determined by the given name and the seed of the RandomFactory.
        参数:
        name - A unique name of the Random instance (indirectly setting its seed).
        返回:
        The new Random instance.

      • createRandom

        protected java.util.Random createRandom(long seed)
        Create a new Random instance with the given seed. The concrete class instantiated is determined by a system property "jasima.core.random.RandomFactory.randomClass" (default: MersenneTwister).
        参数:
        seed - The seed for the new Random instance.
        返回:
        A new Random instance initialized with the given seed.

      • getSeed

        protected long getSeed(java.lang.String name)
        Compute a (hopefully unique) seed which only depends on 'name' and this RandomFactory's seed.

      • setSeed

        public void setSeed(long seed)
        Sets the seed that is used to initialize all random number streams.
        参数:
        seed - The seed to use.

      • initRndGen

        public DblStream initRndGen(DblStream stream,
                            java.lang.String defaultName)
        Initializes the random number generator of a DblStream if it is not already set. As name of the stream DblStream.getName() is used. If it is null, defaultName is used instead.
        参数:
        stream - The stream to initialize.
        defaultName - Default name if stream provides no useful information.
        返回:
        The same as stream.

      • initRndGen

        public DblStream initRndGen(DblStream stream)
        Initializes the random number generator of a DblStream if it is not already set using the stream's name. This method is the same as initRndGen(DblStream, String), just without a default name.
        参数:
        stream - The DblStream to configure.
        返回:
        The stream with random number generator initialized.

      • getSim

        public Simulation getSim()

      • setSim

        public void setSim(Simulation sim)
        Sets the simulation this random factory is currently used with.
